meta.notes: Standardized schema. Month-wide items use end_day=null to mean 'through end of month (29/30)'.
meta.structure: Each item has sections.context_lines and sections.amaal_bullets (with levels).
meta.note: Bullets parsed heuristically from markers (● ○ ■ -). Non-bullet prose placed under Context.

items.text:

pleasures
● Donate/give sadaqah
● Listen to maqtal and cry for Imam
Hussain

food
Prayers:
● Between fajr and duhur
○ Offer 4 unit prayer as 2x 2rakat
prayers

the imams (MJ: Pg 763)

in grief and tears flowing from the
eyes:
○ Recite Ziyarah Taziyah (Giving
condolences to 14 masoom)

items.label: 1st Day / Eid al Fitr
items.text:
● Take bath from when dawn breaks (in middle of fajr /
when fajr sets in) until eid prayer
○ Say Dua while taking the bath on (MJ: Pg 651)
○ When finishing bath say Dua on (MJ: Pg 651)
● Wear good clothes + perfume
● Have breakfast before eid prayer with dates/sweet
● Give zakat fitrah before eid prayer
○ This is acceptance of fasts
○ This is shield against hazards of the year
Prayers:
● Perform eid prayer (in mosque or at home) At home
method below (demo link) to be prayed after sunrise and
before zuhr:
○ Intention: Begin with the utterance of a Salah
(As-Salat) x3.
○ Takbiratul Ihram - Allahu Akbar
○ First Rakat:
■ Recite Surat al-Fatiha.
■ Recite any complete chapter (Surah) of
the Holy Quran.
■ Recite Allahu Akbar and raise your hands.
■ Say anything in Qunoot, such as
"Allahumma salli ala Muhammad wa Ali
Muhammad".
■ Repeat the previous step, reciting Allahu
Akbar and the Qunoot a total of five times
with a simple du'a (supplication) in
between each
● Note: 5 takbirs with 4 Qunoots
■ Go down into Ruku (bowing position).
○ Second Rakat:
■ Rise and recite Surat al-Fatiha.
■ Recite another chapter of the Quran.
■ Recite Allahu Akbar and raise your hands.
■ Say anything in Qunoot, such as
"Allahumma salli ala Muhammad wa Ali
Muhammad".
■ Repeat the previous step, reciting Allahu
Akbar and the Qunoot a total of four
times with three Qunoot supplications in
between.
● Note: 4 takbirs with 3 Qunoots
■ Go down into Ruku.
○ Completion:
■ Recite the record, then recite Tasha-hood
and As-Salat to complete the Salah.
Supplications:
● When going out for eid prayer (after sunrise only)
○ Recite Dua on (MJ: Pg 652)
○ Recite Dua Abu-Hamza At-Thumali
● After Eid Prayer finishes recite Dua on (MJ: Pg 644)
● Ziyarat of Imam Hussain
● Recite Dua Nudbah
○ After completing recitation prostrate and say Dua
on (MJ: Pg 654)

Here is the full supplicatory prayer (duʿāʾ) that Shaykh al-Ṭūsī and Sayyid Ibn Ṭāwūs recommended to be recited after offering
a two-unit (rakʿah) prayer and seeking forgiveness 70 times. This supplication includes extensive praise for Allah (ﻰٰ ﻟَﺎﻌَﺗَوَ ﮫُﻧَﺎﺣَ ﺑْﺳُ ),
blessings upon the Prophet Muhammad (ﷺ) and his family, and prayers for angels and prophets. It is recommended to be
recited after the two-unit prayer and seeking forgiveness 70 times.

Quran Surah's i know benefits
● Surah Fajr
○ 10th dhil hijjah - all will forgive
○ recite in optional prayer to be with imam hussain in heaven on doj
● surah yasin
○ before sunset - person will be protected during whole day
● surah dukhan
○ on friday in the night and at night - will have a mansion built for him in paradise
● surah qaaf
○ alleviate difficulties and throes of death for him
● surah hashr
○ when recited, paraisde, hell, throne, earth, seven heavens, animals, wind, birds,
trees, creatures, sun, moon , al langels invoke allah to besto him with mercy and
forgiveness
● surah mulk
○ recitign this is like one who wakes up praying in the night of qadr
● Surah Haqqah
○ whenever recited his faith will be intact until he meets allah provide he acts on
obligations
● surah muddahir
○ he will accompany pmpbuh
○ he will be granted an elevated degree
○ will not be entangled with misfortunes and pain in dunya
● surah inshirah
○ reward will be same as one who met pmpbuh unhappy and brough the grief out
of his heart
● surah qariah
○ will be pleased with allah
○ possible intercession with pmpbhu
● surah tin
○ will gain safety and certainty
○ equal to reward of fasting one day multiplied by number of people who recited
this surah
● surah alaq
○ when recited, he will be considered as a martyr
● surah zilzal
○ pmpbuh says: recitation is same as one who recited surah baqarah
○ recited 1/4 of quran
● surah aadiyat
○ continuous recitation allah will raise him up with imam ali
● surah qaariah
○ allah will secure him from calamity of dajjal and also from hell on doj
● takathur
○ allah will account his bounties given to himin the world
○ will be rewarded as if he recited 1000 verses of quran
○ recited in wajib/optional prayer is similar reward to martyrdom
● surah asr
○ recited in optional prayer, allah will raise him with a shining, bright face, cheerful
features and delighted eys until when he enters parasite on doj
● surah humazah
○ reward 10 good deeds as many asthe number of those who mocked pmpbuh and
companions
○ recited in wajib prayers, then poverty will be away from him, sustenance will
aprpaoch him, hideous death will be repelled form him
● surah quraysh
○ rewarded with 10 good deeds as many as number of whose who perform tawaf
of kaaba, ihtikaaf in kaaba
● surah maun
○ recited in wajib/optional prayer, allah will accept his prayer and fasting + allah
will disregard the evil he committed in the world
● surah kathar
○ allah will quench his thirstfrom heave
○ will get the reward of all sacrifices which people make on the day of eid + all
sacrifice of people of book and pagans
● kaafiroon
○ as if he recited ¼ of quran
○ will be free from poluthesim
○ will be saved from great terror
